department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: James T. Bowler (Jim) is an information technology executive with over 29 years of experience.  This experience includes management consulting, practice development, technology architecture design, software development, ERP planning/implementation, project management and IT governance.<br><br>He has held various management and technical leadership roles with Accenture LLP, Sequent Computer Systems, Oracle Corporation, Goldman, Sachs & Co. and Rockwell International.<br><br>Mr. Bowler holds a Masters degree in Computer Science and a Bachelors degree in Management Systems (with Honors) from DePaul University.
